display_long_description:
Step into the ethereal realm of Phantom Taggers, an immersive VR multiplayer experience that blends stealth, strategy, and supernatural thrills. As spectral beings caught between worlds, players must navigate through richly detailed haunted locations—from abandoned mansions to eerie graveyards—competing to claim territory by tagging strategic points with their ghostly essence.
Master otherworldly abilities like phasing through walls, temporary invisibility, and environmental manipulation while staying hidden from suspicious mortals who patrol these cursed grounds. Each match becomes a tense game of cat and mouse as you race against rival phantoms to complete objectives, all while the ever-present threat of exorcists and paranormal investigators adds an extra layer of danger.
With cross-platform multiplayer supporting up to 8 ghostly competitors, dynamic weather systems that affect visibility and detection, and an arsenal of phantom powers to unlock, Phantom Taggers delivers heart-pounding supernatural competition unlike anything in VR. Whether you prefer silent infiltration or chaotic haunting tactics, every match offers unique opportunities to prove you're the most cunning spirit in the afterlife.
Experience the thrill of being the thing that goes bump in the night—but remember, in this realm, you're not the only ghost in the machine.
